title: 加了公会插件后就崩溃
author: JTY呕吧
txt_content:
[size=13.3333px]错误代码是Received start command
[size=13.3333px]13.02 21:42:17 [Multicraft] Loading server properties
[size=13.3333px]13.02 21:42:17 [Multicraft] Starting server!
[size=13.3333px]13.02 21:42:17 [Multicraft] Loaded config for "thermos1.7.10.1614(有插件有MOD)"
[size=13.3333px]13.02 21:42:17 [Server] INFO Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM warning: INFO: os::commit_memory(0x0000000649000000, 4194304000, 0) failed; error='Cannot allocate memory' (errno=12)
[size=13.3333px]13.02 21:42:17 [Server] INFO #
[size=13.3333px]13.02 21:42:17 [Server] INFO # There is insufficient memory for the Java Runtime Environment to continue.
[size=13.3333px]13.02 21:42:17 [Server] INFO # Native memory allocation (mmap) failed to map 4194304000 bytes for committing reserved memory.
[size=13.3333px]13.02 21:42:17 [Server] INFO # An error report file with more information is saved as:
[size=13.3333px]13.02 21:42:17 [Server] INFO # /hs_err_pid24850.log
[size=13.3333px]13.02 21:42:17 [Multicraft] Server shut down (starting)
[size=13.3333px]13.02 21:42:17 [Multicraft] Restarting crashed server in 5 seconds
[size=13.3333px]13.02 21:42:17 [Multicraft] Looks like a crash, check the server console. Return value: 1
[size=13.3333px]13.02 21:42:17 [Multicraft] Server stopped
[size=13.3333px]崩溃之后重启了好多次 重于好了 然后现在没崩溃 所有玩家的权限都乱了 普通玩家没权限破坏 之前崩溃前也是 重启就好了

replies.author: JTY呕吧
replies.txt_content: 提示没有权限与什么什么交互 但是权限组列表里可以看到权限
服务器内存设置太小  导致java无法启动服务端 尝试在启动脚本增加内存

replies.author: 白羊羊
replies.txt_content: 如果权限组有权限的话，玩家是否被分配进了那个权限组呢

replies.author: JTY呕吧
replies.txt_content: 知道情况了 客服跟我说服务器被攻击 = =

replies.author: 吕易天
replies.txt_content: 你的面板服质量不好，内存不足，Java虚拟机分配不了足够的内存导致的。
